title: macOS Portfolio (React)
description: An interactive macOS-inspired portfolio built with React, featuring dock navigation, draggable windows, terminal-style commands, and integrated apps like resume viewer and notes. Designed to simulate a real desktop experience inside the browser.

title: Employee Management System
description: A responsive employee management application built with React that allows users to create, update, and delete employee records. Integrated with REST APIs and designed with a clean, user-friendly interface.

title: Spotify Clone
description: A modern music streaming UI clone inspired by Spotify, built with React. Features playlists, track layouts, and a responsive interface that mimics the structure and feel of the original platform.

title: Productivity Dashboard
description: A daily productivity web application for managing tasks and planning activities. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with a clean, minimal interface and responsive layout.

title: Cohort-2 Practice Repository
description: A collection of multiple frontend and backend practice projects created during a structured full-stack learning program. Includes experiments, mini-projects, and exercises built using JavaScript, React, Node.js, and Express.
